DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore intervention use Mindfulness Based Childbirth Parenting education ( MBCP ) target stressed pregnant woman effective : 1 ) reduce prenatal stress , 2 ) prevent perinatal maternal mental ill-health , 3 ) prepare mother labor 4 ) promote positive infant-caregiver attachment .
DOC.brief_title: Mindfulness Based Childbirth Parenting Education - RCT Effects Parent Child Health
DOC.detailed_description: Sample : Pregnant woman experience high level stress , and/or previously period depression anxiety , and/or childhood neglect , eligible study . A sample 170 mother partner recruit antenatal clinic Stockholm ask participate . The participant study randomize either treatment control intervention . The study use experimental design assessment baseline post-intervention well follow-ups 3 , 9 15 month post-partum . The intervention involve eight 2.5 h weekly group session exercise mindfulness practice associate theory taught increase metacognition , emotional regulation body awareness . Participants control condition offer standardized course psychoprophylaxis . Measurements - parental outcomes PSYCHOLOGICAL FUNCTIONING - 10 item Perceived Stress Scale [ 10 ] . Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale [ 11 ] . Positive States Minds [ 12 ] . INTERVENTION ADHERENCE - Questions ass intervention adherence . PHYSIOLOGICAL ASSESSMENTS - Heart Rate Variability ( HRV ) examine ECG . The investigator hypothesize intervention increase HRV pregnant woman , thus provide objective measure stress . The investigator test woman receive intervention pregnancy lower serum level cytokines interleukin-6 interleukin-10 , Brain Derived Neurotrophic Factor-s , Corticotrophin Releasing Hormone compare control group - physiological component influence fetus associate immune response , hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal axis function , stress-related mood disorder preterm delivery [ 13-16 ] . LABOUR - Labour record gather participant . Measurements - infant PHYSIOLOGICAL ASSESSMENTS - Heart Rate Variability ( HRV ) examine ECG 15 month age . The investigator hypothesize increased maternal HRV pregnancy associate increase infant HRV . The investigator also test infant whose mother receive intervention lower serum level cytokines interleukin-6 interleukin-10 , Brain Derived Neurotrophic Factor-S , Corticotrophin Releasing Hor-mone : Levels analyze PKU blood spot , routinely collect 3-4 day birth . INFANT SOCIAL AND EMOTIONAL FUNCTIONING - The attachment style infant assess age 15 month , use standard Parent-Child Early Relational Assessment develop Clark [ 17 ] . Data analysis : Appropriate method apply describe sample . Hypothesis test multivariate repeat measure analysis covariance ( MANCOVA ) perceive stress primary outcome .
DOC.criteria: The study open pregnant woman late second early third trimester pregnancy screen short questionnaire : Those report high level perceive stress , and/or previous mental health issue depression/anxiety , and/or childhood neglect include . Participants must also speak fluent Swedish . Actively psychotic , previous experience mindfulness , third wave cognitive behavioral therapy , related practice .
